short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Google Slides animation tool that overrides the old transitions menu with a fresh and easy to use layout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the new Slides Animator Pro custom animation to create moving elements, with customizable timing and locations! Simply select an element, open the default animation panel, and click "+ Animator Pro Animation". Then customize your animation with a start and end position, and generate. After a couple seconds the morph transition will be complete!

Also adds a variety of animation presets, that can generate a transition 10x easier and faster than could ever be done without.
